p: The purified and dried cellulose hydrolysate fraction consists of 71.6% glucose as well as 16.6% xylose and was mixed with choline chloride in a ratio of 1:1 (w/w). Afterwards, the mixture was stirred and heated up to 100Â°C until the liquid DES was formed. The DES was directly used as solvent and substrate for the enzymatic sugar ester synthesis.
